title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! May 22nd thru Jun
description:
I know I am late, but I am positive that everyone will enjoy the last 11 programs of C2C! The broadcasts have been, in my opinion, spectacular! Well, anyway, without any further procrastination, here they are! Download, SEED, and Enjoy! Thanks in advance to all the seeders! Until sometime next week, Stokeman Out.....

Thursday May 22nd, 2008
The Ancient Crystal Skulls
Egyptologist and pre-historian Stephen Mehler discussed ancient crystal skulls (photos), exploring their debated history, and mysterious functions and properties. He refuted a recent report that the skulls are "modern fakes," and said academic scientists... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Stephen S. Mehler, Charles Ostman

Friday May 23rd, 2008
Remote Viewing Updates
Art Bell welcomed foremost remote viewing teacher Major Ed Dames, who discussed some current cases of his Matrix Intelligence Agency as well as provided updates on past predictions. Dames said a world food crisis is coming that will be caused...
Host: Art Bell
Guest(s): Major Ed Dames

Saturday May 24th, 2008
D.B. Cooper & Organized Crime
During the first two hours, attorney Galen Cook wrapped up his D.B. Cooper investigation. He was joined by a man who says he is Cooper&#039;s son. In the third hour, journalist Misha Glenny (book link) revealed the intricacies and pervasiveness of... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Galen Cook, Misha Glenny

Sunday May 25th, 2008
UK UFO Files
Former leader of the UK&#039;s UFO Project, Nick Pope joined host George Knapp (email) to discuss recent disclosures from the British Ministry of Defense. This sweeping release of UFO information by the UK government allows for researchers to "go to the raw... 
Host: George Knapp
Guest(s): Nick Pope, Ted Phillips

Monday May 26th, 2008
Mysteries of Cosmology & Space
Theoretical physicist Dr. Richard Hammond discussed his new book The Unknown Universe, which explores mysterious aspects of cosmology and space. Cosmic acceleration, he explained, is the accepted concept that the universe is in a constant state of expansion,... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Richard Hammond, Richard C. Hoagland

Tuesday May 27th, 2008
Enoch, Thoth & the Pyramid
Author and filmmaker Ken Klein presented his thesis that Egypt&#039;s Great Pyramid was built by Enoch, and serves as an oracle to help humankind transcend to their higher nature. Klein contended that the Egyptian ruler known as Thoth, who wrote The Book... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Ken Klein, John Johnsen, M.K. Davis

Wednesday May 28th, 2008
UFOs: Cases & Confrontations
In a UFO Special, researcher & filmmaker James Fox and author Richard Dolan appeared separately and together to discuss disclosure, notable UFO cases and confrontations. Appearing during the second hour, Fox was joined by Stephenville, Texas UFO witness... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): James Fox, Richard Dolan, Joshua P. Warren

Thursday May 29th, 2008
Drones, Spheres & the Mars Lander
Investigative reporter Linda Moulton Howe presented reports on &#039;dragonfly&#039; drone sightings, a pearl-colored sphere retrieved in Alabama, the Mars Phoenix Lander, and a new cattle mutilation case. The new Mars mission isn&#039;t intended to determine...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Linda Moulton Howe, Jeffrey L. Peckman, Stan Romanek

Friday May 30th, 2008
Weird Stories
During Open Lines, George offered a &#039;Weird Stories&#039; hotline. He also asked for a few native Hawaiians to phone into the show and speak in the Pidgin language. A caller near Dallas, Texas recounted a strange experience she had while working as a nurse.... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, Paola Harris

Saturday May 31st, 2008
Irrational Thinking
Lecturer Ori Brafman and his brother, psychologist Dr. Rom Brafman discussed their new book Sway, which looks at why people make irrational choices. "The way that we defined it," Rom said about irrational thinking, "is that it&#039;s about doing something... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Ori Brafman, Rom Brafman, Alejandro Rojas, James Chiles

Sunday June 1st, 2008
Shamanism & Earth Changes
Futurist John Jay Harper shared his investigation into native shamanism as it correlates with the near-death experience (NDE), earth changes, and a global shift in consciousness. The shamanic tradition dates back thousands of years. Shamans, often... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John Jay Harper, Loren Coleman
